mapper.select: SELECT INFO_ENG AS ENG, INFO_CAR AS CAR, INFO_PRO AS PRO, INFO_FAT AS FAT, INFO_NA AS NA FROM RECIPE WHERE RCP_SEQ = #{rcp_seq}
SELECT #{year} AS YEAR, #{mon} AS MON, COUNT(*) AS INC FROM SUB_INFO S WHERE TO_CHAR(S.SINSERTDATE, 'YY') = #{year} AND TO_CHAR(S.SINSERTDATE, 'MM') = #{mon}
SELECT #{year} AS YEAR, #{mon} AS MON, COUNT(*) AS INC FROM MEMBER M WHERE TO_CHAR(M.MINSERTDATE, 'YY') = #{year} AND TO_CHAR(M.MINSERTDATE, 'MM') = #{mon}
